summary: THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO THE DEALER AT 30,000 MILES BECAUSE OF A "CLICKING NOISE" COMING FROM THE ENGINE.  THE DEALER STATED THERE WAS NO PROBLEM WITH THE ENGINE.  THE VEHICLE WAS THEN TAKEN TO AN INDEPENDENT MECHANIC WHO FOUND A PROBLEM WITH THE TENSION ON THE TIMING CHAIN.  THE PART WAS ON BACK ORDER.  *NLM    *TT  *JB
